It can be used as a bookshelf by attaching multiple hangers together and using them to hold books and other items.
As a towel rack, by hanging it on a wall and using it to hang a towel.
It can be used as a clothes rack for outdoor activities such as hiking or camping.
It can be used as a support for a tablecloth or a curtain.
As a makeshift clothesline for drying small items such as socks or underwear.
